alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 29 at 3:27PM EST until December 01 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall accumulations are expected near and north of Route 28.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
